abstract: Saturday Profile of Nazir Afzal, first Muslim chief crown prosecutor ever appointed in England and nation's most senior Muslim lawyer; Afzal is Britain's go-to prosecutor on violence against women, particularly women in minority communities; Afzal has come under fire from some Muslims for fighting against forced marriages and honor killings.
lead_paragraph: Nazir Afzal, a Muslim born in England to Pakistani parents, has become London’s go-to lawyer for cases involving violence against women.

headline.main: A Muslim Prosecutor in Britain, Fighting Forced Marriages and Honor Crimes
headline.print_headline: A Muslim Prosecutor in Britain, Fighting Forced Marriages and Honor Crimes

snippet: Nazir Afzal, a Muslim born in England to Pakistani parents, has become London’s go-to lawyer for cases involving violence against women....
